meanings.definition: A device used to measure the density of a substance.
meanings.sent1: The densitometers in the lab helped us determine the thickness of the liquid.
meanings.sent2: Scientists rely on densitometers to accurately calculate the mass of various materials.
meanings.sent3: The densitometers at the factory were so precise, they could even measure the density of air!
meanings.sent4: Her eyes were like densitometers, able to gauge the weight of emotions in a room.
meanings.sent5: The densitometers hummed softly as they analyzed the density of the soil samples.
